section_text: 1 Section 23 of the  Marriage Act 1949 (benefices held in plurailty) shall extend to Wales with the omission of the words “under the Pastoral Reorganisation Measure, 1949,” and accordingly Schedule 6 to that Act (which specifies provisions of the Act which do not extend to Wales) shall be amended by the omission of the reference to that section.
2 1 This Act may be cited as the Marriage (Wales) Act 1986. 2 This Act and the Marriage Acts 1949 to 1983 may be cited together as the Marriage Acts 1949 to 1986.
